head.title: A Summer Romance: Apple and Rhubarb

hedline.hl1: A Summer Romance: Apple and Rhubarb

abstract.p: Red Jacket Orchards introduces freshly pressed apple juice with hint of rhubarb to give it subtle winey flavor; juice is available until middle of August; photo (M)

block.p: The winey tartness of rhubarb adds a nice touch to the apple juice just introduced by Red Jacket Orchards of Geneva, N.Y. The freshly pressed, pasteurized juice has a hint of pink and is excellent over ice or cut with iced tea or lemonade. At cocktail time, it is a felicitous mixer for gin. This summer, the juice is available until around Aug. 10 at the Red Jacket Orchards stand in some Greenmarkets, including Union Square (Mondays) and McCarren Park in Williamsburg, Brooklyn (Saturdays). The juice is $1.25 for the 16-ounce size, $2 for 32 ounces and $3 for 64 ounces. The juice is also available at Gourmet Garage, Healthy Pleasures, King Kullen and Stew Leonard's stores.
